update.releaseNotes:
v3.5.0 - Changelog
New --- - Add support for Replicard Sandbox farming for all 4 Zones currently available. No support for Treasures/Defenders/Bosses. - Add initial check at bot start to see if AccessibilityService is dead and will notify you to restart it by throwing an Exception. - Add preliminary check to see if Quick Summon is ready during Combat Mode before using it. - Add support for Lvl 120 Osiris.
Changed --- - Minor optimization to ML Kit's text recognition. - Combat Script will be properly empty if none is selected.
Fixed --- - Fix Discord notifications having the wrong item amounts. - Fix possible infinite looping while looking for all matches on screen.
